name: Placebo Effect
description: Placebo Effect is a fast-paced shooter video game set in a stunning 3D world of hostile inner-space. As you pilot an advanced nanotechnology medical device called the Shotbot deep into the darkest recesses of inner-space, you will master your ship's mechanics such as flying, shooting, performing barrel rolls and other special moves! As you travel you will find weapons, Immunition, and nutrient power-ups to help you defeat biohazardous invaders that threaten your energy supply. You will contend with locked valves that block your path, as well as other biological dangers but as you explore you will discover medicinal elixirs and turbo jetpacks that will help you on your journey...if you can make it.
